casebody.data:
State ex rel. Kerr
v.
Reger 2018-0425 Supreme Court of Ohio. June 27, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

O'Connor, C.J., and O'Donnell, Kennedy, French, Fischer, DeWine, and DeGenaro, JJ., concur.

MERIT DECISIONS WITHOUT OPINIONS

In Prohibition. On motion to dismiss. Motion granted. Cause dismissed.

Relator's motion for peremptory writ of prohibition denied as moot.
